subject: Express shipping refund request – Order #SSN4791 (not delivered within 3–7 days)
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Support,

I paid for Express shipping (stated delivery time 3–7 days), but my order
from 13 December (Order #SSN4791) still hasn’t been delivered. Today is 28
December, so it clearly missed both the advertised timeframe and Christmas.

Please refund the Express shipping charge.
Also, please tell me the current status and expected delivery date.

Thank you,
David

conversations.body_text: Hi David Leyser,    We apologize for the delay. Your package is expected to arrive within the next couple of days. We will refund your additional shipping charges. We're sorry for the inconvenience!  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELI1541381405YQ         Happy New Year!

Hello,

I have not received a refund/credit note yet. Also, from the upgrade kit I
only received the colored rubber parts and the hard plastic spacers. All
the springs and the dampers shown in the pictures are missing.


Thanks

David

service@simsonn.com

Hi David Leyser,    We apologize for the inconvenience, but we have already refunded your extra shipping charges.  Additionally, the shock absorbers should have been pre-installed on your pedals—please verify this.  Please let us know which spring was not shipped, and we will arrange for a replacement to be sent to you.
